Detailed Description

Allows you to use the stream output operator instead of vsl_print_summary.

Author:
Ian Scott So instead of 
   os << "Blah: ";
   vsl_print_summary(os, blah);
you can use 
   os << "Blah: " << vsl_stream_summary(blah);
